definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="speed">speed</variable><variable type="Number" id="spread">spread</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:speed</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Speed you want to launch your particle</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:spread</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">How spread out you want your particles to be.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.02</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi" inline="false"><field name="particle">WATER_BUBBLE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The particle you want to use. The only thing you should change is particle type.</comment><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">DON'T change this value. If you want to spawn multiple particles use a repeat block.</comment></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">entity.getEyeHeight()</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Used for entity eye height position</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_look_angle_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field
